Rampage finally made it far enough from the battlefield, where he
figured he was safe. He rolled up behind a large rock formation, then
transformed, trying as best he could to put Mutate down. He then
clutched Mutates remaining hand.

"No, not again. You can't leave me again, not now." He said through
rugged breaths. He looked the Mutate over. "In hundreds of vorns, your
the only one to ever understand my pain." he said, clutching at his
breast where his twisted spark resided. "Do not die on me," he begged.
"fo The miserable like I have no other medicine But only hope."
